messages.title: A fairer future for Clock House ward
messages.content: Your Lib Dem team: Paul, Jonathan and Reg's pledges to you

keyPolicies.policyDescription: We will keep Council Tax down and return to 'fairer' community charges that are funded through being banked by the borough.
We will not let Tory cuts reduce what in Bromley and the care there is and ensure that we play fair and equip for all age groups in our parks.
We will ensure that all streets are kept clean, pursue anti-fly tipping and bring Environmental Health back under one department.
We will work with community groups and voluntary agencies to bring the Bank into our area.
We will repair and refurnish the 'road' and 'right the bus route' and bring public transport to the borough.

issues.education: Lib Dems have announced plans to cut class sizes to twelve through a multi-billion pound pupil premium.

leaflet.personalStatement: The Liberal Democrats have been challenging the Tory Mayor of London to explain why he intends cutting 455 full time Police Officers from the Metropolitan Police.

politicalExperience.achievements: Worked on crime reduction with local communities.

images.caption: Your Lib Dem team: A fairer future for Clock House ward
Lib Dems set out plans for smaller class sizes
